description:
Golden Sun The Lost Age puts the player into the roles of an Adept named Felix and his allies
as they seek to restore the power of Alchemy to the world of Weyard. Along the way, the player 
uses Psynergy to defeat enemies and discover new locations, help out local populations, 
and find elemental Djinn which augment the character's powers.

0.1.0-alpha.description:
First Release of the Golden Sun The Lost Age Archipelago World!

Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's `Install APWorld` button, or just copy and paste `gstla.apworld` into your `custom_worlds` folder. 
 Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running `Generate Template Options` in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please note that while we believe this AP World works, given the sheer volume of options base rando has, we did not get a chance to test all of it, nor have we done many full game runs yet, so expect bugs.  Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320)
0.1.0-alpha.title: Initial Release of GSTLA AP World

0.1.1-alpha.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Updates in this release:

1. Lucky Medal overhaul: When Item Shuffle is set to All Items, there is now exactly one lucky medal marked progression.  All others are marked as filler.  When Item Shuffle is just All Chests and Tablets, then all lucky medals are marked as filler.  There is a lucky medal in a barrel in Lemuria if you need it.
2. New Option: Auto Run
3. The categorization of items being useful vs filler has been updated.  In general if you can rebuy it from the artifact shop, it's marked as useful, otherwise filler (some exceptions apply).  Boots, Rings, and Shirts are all marked as useful as well.  There are also options to mark forgeables and most artifacts as filler.
4. New Option: Scale Mimics, so you don't get destroyed by a high level mimic in sphere 1, but will get appropriately challenged in later spheres (or destroyed if you or your friends go out of logic).
5. New Option: Scale Character Levels, scales the party members by sphere they should be obtained in.  Has a related option for the max level that this should be scaled to, default is 24.
6. Black Crystal and Piers are no longer logically required to enter the ship when the ship starts open or the player starts with a ship.  In fact, Black Crystal is just removed from the item pool in these cases.
7. Hover is now an alias for the item Hover Jade.  The other psynergy items were already aliased.

Bug fixes:
1. Fixed an issue where GSLTA could not be part of a multiworld with TUNIC.
0.1.1-alpha.title: 0.1.1-alpha

0.1.2-alpha.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Updates in this release:
1. Remove Start with Reveal option as it is redundant with the AP starting inventory (from pool) options.
2. Many location groups were added for towns, caves, dungeons and the like

Bug fixes:
1. Fix Filler and Trap weights were not set properly per player causing players to receive items that were not part of their pools.
2. Slight adjustment to Lemuria's eclipse location as it did not properly take `reveal_hidden_item` into account for finding the lucky medal in Lemuria. Only applicable for `item_shuffle` on `chests and tablets`
3. Update the description for `lemurian_ship` to reflect if the Black Crystal is part of the pool or not
4. Few location names have been updated as they were mislabeled
5. Fix issue with `second_starting_character` and `Jenna` vs `Sheba` mixup
0.1.2-alpha.title: 0.1.2-alpha

0.1.3-alpha.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Changes in this release:

- Option `major_minor_split` is removed, majority if not all of the option is covered through the use of `priority` / `excluded` locations.
- New location groups have been added to facility prioritizing locations easier.
- Merged latest AP Upstream updates
- `shuffle_weapon_effects` and `shuffle_armour_effects` are now turned off by default to make it a bit more new player friendly.
- Fix `Daila - Buried` Item not requiring `Reveal` when `reveal_hidden_items` is enabled
- Adjust Garoh North West Ledge location names to make it more clear to check on the ledge in the north west corner
0.1.3-alpha.title: 0.1.3-alpha

0.1.4-alpha.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/37f22adaa967bf7b2f1b62754d4ffb57768e74ab/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Changes in this release:

- Adjusted Logic for accessing Shaman Village through Village cave as it can be done with Lift and Frost, not requiring Whirlwind at all.
- Rename Djinn locations to be more descriptive instead of only the Djinni that is located at it in Vanilla. This should hopefully make the 2 commands to check which djinn you have or haven't checked a bit more helpful.
- Add option to `djinn_shuffle` to shuffle djinn within their element.
- Added `artefacts_are_filler` and `forge_materials_are_filler` to the option group for filler and trap distribution settings.
0.1.4-alpha.title: 0.1.4-alpha

0.2.0-beta.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/gstla/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/gstla/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Changes in this release:
- Added option `goal` to set alternative goals, this is freely customizable to have multiple goals or just a singular one. Default is `Doom Dragon`
  - (Super)Bosses can be set as tar... goals.
  - Collectathon Djinn edition. (use `djinn_hunt_count` to set amount needed)
  - Collectathon Summon edition. (use `summon_hunt_count` to set amount needed)
- Added option `random_goals` to randomly select a number of goals from your goals list to be your collective goal.
- Added client commands to be able to know your goal (`goals`) and to track progress (`goals_completed`) to your goal. Unfortunately there currently is no way to show this information in game yet. Once this is possible we will be sure to include it, but for now this will do.
- Haze (Jupiter Djinn at Apoji Islands) now logically requires Lash, note that you can still drop down and sanctum warp out to get the djinn but it will not be logically expected anymore.
- Added many events to boss flags for tracking progress towards goals, comes with minor logic adjustments.
- Added option `disable_shop_gametickets` to give players control if they want shopkeeprs to handout game tickets
- Added gametickets and game ticket rewards as possible fillers to existing filler groups `common_consumable_filler_weight` and `lucky_equipment_filler_weight`.
- Removed guarenteed items from `common_consumable_filler_weight` and `lucky_equipment_filler_weight` in the itempool.
- Fixed an issue where the patch file could not be downloaded from the website.
- More technical side, more information is stored in slotdata so trackers can make use of it. This is mostly focused on the logically and goal relevant things.
0.2.0-beta.title: 0.2.0-beta

0.2.1-beta.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/gstla/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/gstla/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Changes in this release:
- Add option `shortcut_mars_lighthouse`, enabling this allows access to the 4 elemental puzzles right before doom dragon with just the Mars Star item and no longer requires lighting up the Lighthouse itself. Note that Fugue is still locked behind lighting up the lighthouse.
- Add option `shortcut_magma_rock`, enabling this pushes down the shortcut pillar at the bottom into place allowing you to navigate Magma Rock interior in reverse.
- Add few missing events to help tracking
- Fix issue in bizhawk client showing events as a complex object structure instead of more readable format
- Assign new deprioritzed tag to collectathon items, deprioritized items will avoid being placed on prioritized locations
- Adjust logic for Lemuria hidden scooped locations and Loho hidden scooped items to require reveal when `reveal_hidden_item` is enabled
- Now uses the bizhawk overlay from AP core.

Note: Archipelago version 0.6.3+ is required. It will not work on 0.6.2 or earlier versions
0.2.1-beta.title: 0.2.1-beta

0.2.2-beta.description:
Game description is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/gstla/worlds/gstla/docs/en_Golden%20Sun%20The%20Lost%20Age.md).
(Don't expect the link to the options page to work.)

Game setup guide is [here](https://github.com/cjmang/Archipelago/blob/gstla/worlds/gstla/docs/setup_en.md).

To install the AP World, use the Archipelago Launcher's Install APWorld button, or just copy and paste gstla.apworld into your custom_worlds folder.
Once the apworld is installed you can find a yaml after running Generate Template Options in the AP Launcher.

In general this AP World implementation relies heavily on the existing randomizer, which you can find here: https://gs2randomiser.com/en/index.html

Please reach out in the [GSTLA Post in Future Game Design on the AP discord if you find issues.](https://discord.com/channels/731205301247803413/1055515261270241320).

Changes in this release:
- Addition of Archipelago.json file to support Archipelago version 0.7.0.
- Addition of description and tracker fields for AP World Manager.

Note: Archipelago version 0.6.3+ is required. It will not work on 0.6.2 or earlier versions
0.2.2-beta.title: 0.2.2-beta
